name: roi2nix
label: ROI to NIfTI
description: This gear converts ROIs created in Flywheel's OHIF viewer to NIfTI files.
author: Flywheel

Input_File.description: NIfTI or DICOM file with ROI drawn in OHIF Viewer (Required).

save_NRRD.description: Saves the ROI's as output Type NRRD instead of Nifti.  Default False

save_binary_masks.description: Saves individually labeled ROIs as binary masks. Otherwise use bitmasked values (sums of powers of two). Default is True.

save_combined_output.description: Saves all ROIs in a single bitmasked file. If less than 2 ROIs exists, then this has no effect. Default is False.

save_slicer_color_table.description: Saves a 3D Slicer colortable file for 3D Slicer integration. Default is False.
